data.what_is:
Customer experience matters more than ever. Automate your lead capture & distribution, notify sales users, and get detailed reports. Empower Your Customers. 24/7 Support. Fully Customizable.
Sales
Automation leads can be categorized as qualified, interested or contacted based on how
far they are in the sales pipeline. With our tool you can automatically schedule tasks and
events like sales meetings, follow-up messages, and emails. It can also track a sales
executive's daily plans and activities and set reminders and alarms for delivering on
their commitments. Hence, it increases reach to the potential customers.

Call now for the free demo on +919643404012
#leadmanagement #leadmanagementsoftware #CRM #crmsoftware #SalesAutomation #Customizedsoftware #cx #salesforce #customer #customerexperience #customersuccess #saas #retail #customerservice #sales #ecommerce
data.product_description:
Customer experience matters more than ever. Automate your lead capture & distribution, notify sales users, and get detailed reports. Empower Your Customers. 24/7 Support. Fully Customizable.
Sales
Automation leads can be categorized as qualified, interested or contacted based on how
far they are in the sales pipeline. With our tool you can automatically schedule tasks and
events like sales meetings, follow-up messages, and emails. It can also track a sales
executive's daily plans and activities and set reminders and alarms for delivering on
their commitments. Hence, it increases reach to the potential customers.

Call now for the free demo on +919643404012

the managable dashboard and easy intergrations

What do you dislike about PRP - Lead Management?
i havent faced any issues that i dislike as im new on the platform

im a new small business trying out new systems to better organize

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about PRP - Lead Management?
Easy to use. Easy to set up. No headaches.

What do you dislike about PRP - Lead Management?
Customer service can be long wait times.

What problems is PRP - Lead Management solving and how is that benefiting you?
Making team management easy and pain-free. So I spend less time worrying about it.
